text: Jasmin Bhasin is an Indian actress and model known for portraying Twinkle Taneja Sarna in Zee TV's Tashan-e-Ishq, and Teni Bhanushali in Colors TV's Dil Se Dil Tak ==Early life== Bhasin was born and raised in Kota in Rajasthan. She graduated from a hospitality college in Jaipur. ==Career== Bhasin began her modelling career with print and television advertisements. In 2011, Bhasin made her acting debut with the Tamil film Vaanam. She then worked in South Indian films like Karodpathi, Veta, and Ladies & Gentlemen and also appeared in commercial ads. In 2015, Bhasin was cast as the female lead in Zee TV's popular romantic series Tashan-E-Ishq. In 2017, she secured the lead role of "Teni" in Colors TV Show Dil Se Dil Tak. In 2019, she played the lead role of "Happy" in Star Plus's Dil Toh Happy Hai Ji but soon quit due to changes in storyline as she was uncomfortable playing a mother on screen and Donal Bisht replaced her. She was also seen in the ninth season of Colors TV's popular reality show Khatron Ke Khiladi where she ended as a semi-finalist. In November 2019, Bhasin joined the cast of Naagin 4 as Nayantara. But things did not work out and Rashmi Desai replaced her. She joined khatron ke Khiladi made in India . ==Filmography== ===Television=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! Year !
